name: AAON, Inc.
description: AAON, Inc. is a leading manufacturer of HVAC (heating, ventilation, and air conditioning) and refrigeration equipment in the United States. Founded in 1988 and headquartered in Tulsa, Oklahoma, AAON specializes in the design, engineering, and production of high-efficiency, environmentally friendly air conditioning and heating products. The company’s innovative approach focuses on energy efficiency and sustainability, with a commitment to reducing the carbon footprint of its products. AAON’s extensive product line includes rooftop units, chillers, and custom air handling units, catering to commercial and industrial applications. The company is recognized for its strong emphasis on quality and reliability, offering solutions that meet stringent industry standards. AAON also prioritizes customer service and support, providing clients with comprehensive technical assistance and training. With a dedicated workforce and state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities, AAON continues to advance its technology and product offerings, ensuring it remains at the forefront of the HVAC industry. The company’s mission is to provide high-performance products that enhance the comfort and safety of indoor environments while promoting energy conservation and sustainability.
